approaches_tried.details: Successfully proved non-modal cases (atom, bot, imp) directly without IH. Modal cases (box, all_future, all_past) still need IH with false hypotheses. Net effect: increased sorry count from 6 to 8.
approaches_tried.abandoned_reason: Modal subcases still require false hypotheses, doesn't eliminate sorries

key_findings.details: After createNewFamily: familyIndices has two families, not one. After createNewTime: timeIndices has two times, not one.

key_findings.finding: Positive G/H cases unreachable from neg paths
key_findings.details: After any neg case, phi is always an imp formula, which can only match neg cases or generic imp. Positive Box/G/H require phi to be box/all_future/all_past, which imp formulas are not.
Positive G/H cases use no_future_times_of_single_time to prove addToAllFutureTimes is no-op. Without single-time, need addToAllFutureTimes_preserves_seedConsistent.

key_findings.finding: temp_4 axiom enables derivation at future times
key_findings.details: G phi -> G(G phi) means if G phi is at timeIdx, then G phi is derivable at any future time t'. From G phi, derive phi via temp_t. This chain enables proving addToAllFutureTimes preserves consistency.

needs_to_be_proven.name: addToAllFutureTimes_preserves_seedConsistent
needs_to_be_proven.proof_strategy: Use temp_4 axiom (G psi -> G(G psi)) to derive G psi at future times, then temp_t (G psi -> psi) to derive psi.

needs_to_be_proven.name: addToAllPastTimes_preserves_seedConsistent
needs_to_be_proven.proof_strategy: Similar to future case, using appropriate past temporal axioms.

recommended_approach: Option B from research-007.md: Add supporting lemmas, then weaken hypotheses
